summary: Utility class that prepares configurations and synthetic inputs, instantiates GPT‑BigCode models, and runs comprehensive checks on their forward, backward, and task‑specific behaviors such as classification, language modeling, attention handling, and weight initialization.
business_intent: Provide an automated testing framework to validate the correctness, stability, and performance of GPT‑BigCode model implementations across various use‑cases, supporting continuous integration and quality assurance processes.
